title: Size isn’t accurate
body: So I’m a big guy and I reviewed the sizing and so while XXL was recommended on the survey. I went with 3XL saying a size up should be more comfortable. It arrived and it’s still so very small. Way to small to wear and getting it replaced would be too late as the wedding would pass by the time a new one would be sent. The colors match but sizing is off by a whole lot. Even measured the pants sizing and this was also off
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024

title: Price
body: Not bad for the price
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2024

title: Runs small size up
body: My husband was fitted at the store so when we saw that the size chart was similar to what we had seen in store we bought it thinking we had found a match. It looked good but my husband said it was a tight fit so size up.

title: Great quality and fit well
body: Dubious plastic packaging but it was double bagged so everything was fine and protected. I think it looked allot better than what I paid for it. All 3 pieces fit wonderfully. The wrinkles from shipping came out just fine.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2024

title: Nice suit
body: I bought the 3pc light grey slim fit suit.  I am 6' 2 and 190lbs average build,  and I ordered the XL.  the jacket and vest fit perfectly on shoulders and around the waist,  sleeve length I will probably tailor to make 1/2 -3/4 shorter. I normally wear 36 around the waist.  the pants fit perfectly around the waist, but were snug around my thunder thighs but that is how slim fit is supposed to be, I am used to loose fitting pant legs,  I naturally have thick thighs and did a lot of cycling in the past.  as for length,  expect all suit pants to have pant legs needing to be taken back they leave them long so you can adjust the length at a tailor, (or yourself if you know how to sew) . Over all I am quite happy with this suit,
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2024

title: Item missing
body: Missing the pants, supposed to be a 3 pieces suit. Please correct the mistake.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2024

title: Great suit and nice fabric!
body: Great suit for prom! Highly surprised in the quality. Looked great on my son.  Large fit perfect, he is 6’1”. The only downfall is, it doesn’t have the satin down the leg.  My son didn’t know the difference.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2024

title: After returning for a Replacement different size the company came through. I love it!!!
body: I ordered XL which is what I wear. I have 7 other suits XL and they fit perfect. When I ordered this suit the first time XL didn't fit like my other suits. No offense to China making the product but they don't know the standard XL sizes in U.S. I returned it and the company immediately refunded the money back on my card. I turned right around and ordered 2XL, 2 days later it showed up. I tried the suit on and perfect fit. My wife loves the suit. I gave 5 stars because this company will replace it or any part of the suit, it says so on their card that comes with the suit. I will order again from this comapany W & J Mens Wear. I highly recommend them if you're looking for an awesome suit at a reasonable price. It arrived just in time for my trip. Thank you W & J Mens Wear
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2024

title: Great fit and quality for the price
body: Ordered a XL nervous it wasn’t going to fit but the fit was perfect. Athletic build 210 6’2”. The jacket arms were my only complaint they were a little snug in the bicep/shoulder area. Pant length has to be at least 34 inseam 38 out seam. Keep in mind the pants are definitely a straight cut to slim straight fit. Comparable measurements I typically wear a 34-36 @ h&m pants/ 36 in mnml pants/ 36 in Levi’s I’m a 40-44 neck for dress shirts/lg -xl in shirts
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2024

title: Awesome suit
body: Got it to go to family reunion and it fits perfect!
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2024

title: This soup came used, even the pockets were ripped open
body: The suit came used and I paid full price
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2024

title: Fits and looks great
body: Husband got a size XL, he’s 6’0” 198lbs.  His biggest concern when purchasing was the fit of the pants.  He’s a 34” waist and they fit comfortable with the hidden elastic sewn in.  He just needs to hem the length by about an inch or two.  He normally gets a 34x34 in pants.  Would definitely recommend.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2024

title: It fits!
body: I really didn't expect it to fit but I had time to find something else before our daughters wedding. I returned a much more expensive one from Macys because they didn't have the right size pants. These don't even have a separate size for the pants so I was pretty sure they wouldn't work but amazingly they fit on my 6ft 170 lb husband! I laughed at the tie tying guide but the reality is my hubby has only worn one a few times in his life so it will come in handy. Great touch!
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2024

title: A Happy Birthday Recipient!
body: I purchased this suit for my brothers birthday and he ecstatic about this one. This is the second one I purchased for him and he wears them to church on Sunday. I highly recommend this brand! Thank you for the excellent product and price.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2024

title: Perfect fit

title: Amazing Suit

title: Fits perfectly!
body: My son is 6’2” and weighs 160 lbs. He wears pants size W30”x L34”. I can never find him a whole suit that fits. I am AMAZED at how perfectly this fits him! And it looks expensive! I am very impressed.

title: Excellent Value
body: The suit fit excellent and is made very well. I was super impressed! For the money, you cant match what you get. Does not look or feel cheap. Very happy!

title: Great Value
body: This is probably the best value on Amazon, a 3 piece suit including tie for $100.  If you are in a quick bind for a funeral or social engagement or need something for a growing kid without a major investment this will work well.  You'll need to spend a few bucks and a couple days to get it pressed upon arrival.  The fit was pretty good, I ordered my regular jacket size and it would have worked ok, not as great as higher priced but again, you are buying for the value so keep that in mind.  I didn't try on the pants because the Navy Blue was darker than would work for me so I returned it but had the color been right for my need, I would have kept it.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2024

title: So Amazing! My son loved it.
body: Bought for my teenage sons and they loved it. They looked amazing. The sizing was a bit confusing because measuring their chests, and the sizing chart did not collaborate. i took a guess and got a size, and was just lucky. I still gave you a five for quality.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2024

title: Muy fino buena calidad.

title: Not all orders are equal
body: Originally purchased this as an XL unfortunately due to the pants size it did not fit and it needed to be returned. The product showed up in box was very well presented and was very well made. When I received the XXL The item was in a loose bag and was definitely a return from another person wrinkled folded funky smelt weird. Additionally the pants were no bigger in the double XL than the XL except in the waist. I will be returning and getting a completely different brand.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2024

title: Saved a lot of money compared to renting a suit.
body: I was pleasantly surprised! Decent for the money, looks nice for prom. Saved a lot of money compared to renting a suit. My son said it fit well and he had no complaints.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2024

title: Great suit! Great fit!
body: Wow!  just received this suit in Navy for my son and I am actually amazed at how great it is!  Arrived well packaged in a box. Has a few wrinkles that a steamer should take care of.  Feels like a heavier quality fabric. The fit is impeccable. Jacket and vest look like they were made for him.  Only thing it needs is a little hem. We were short on time and I will admit I was nervous to take my chances with something unseen. But reviews didn’t lead me wrong. For reference, my son is 18, just under 6ft and about 200 lb.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2024

title: Torn Shoulder After 1 wear!
body: The shoulders of the suit  has already torn.  I am sending the suit back.  It was embarrassing to wear to an event and the suit begin falling apart.

title: Small size not medium and tight pants!!
body: I don't know how this company can say a mediums and medium the meeting is more like a small their specifications are off and the quality is poor! Do not buy this suit set. Looks like costume quality The quality of the suit is like a Halloween costume cheap and very thin material! The suit was also tight does not fit well I don't know how they can say it's a medium when it's like a kid size crazy! Especially since they're asking over 100 dollars
